title: What advice will you give to a 12th PCM student? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey! Actually I am from PCMC (Comp.Sci) background.Here are few advices from my side. You are in one of the important phase of your life. This is like a bridge between your schooling and professional course. So,recognize your interest, passion and move towards it. Be regular to class and concentrate to lectures.If you are planning for B.E then better start preparing for JEE or other entrance exams from the very beginning of the year.If you plan to opt Engineering, learn basics of programming (C or C++) now itself.Prepare time-table and try to follow it regularly.Marks matters alot in this course.But remember understanding the concept is most important.Read Textbook.Spend sometime for physical exercises(sports, jogging) to keep yourself active everyday.Minimum 6 hours of sleep is must.Be an early bird rather than a night owl.At last, don't be afraid. Spend time with your friends and relax. Don't worry if you could not excel with flying colors.12th is not the end. There are still more opportunities in future to be a better version of yourself . All the best for your future. Thanks for scrolling ;)

i m not gona say you should do this ,do that or study hard …all i m gona say what i truly truly believe in or you can say i learnt it throughout all these years of my clg , various jobs , preparation and life …okay lets starts…. first find out in what kind of situation you are means 1.your interest in studying/ learning capacity ..means if you are very good in studies and you have enough capacity to put yourself in learning mode for a long period of time then go for iit jee … otherwise DO NOT waste time in half hearted efforts… 2.your specific passion / talent/skills… along with your studies acquire some skills …it could be anything according to your interest like.. hardcore programming..web designing /development.. ,digital marketing ,ethical hacking , film making ,video editing ..,vfx, ,stock market etc etc … you have enough time you can become world class in any of those things earn a quite well life style . 3.financial condition of your family… means if you are rich then just do not worry you will eventually figure out what is good for you … in 2nd case …try to be financial independent as soon as possible..you have time make mistakes or you can go in into the AIR FORCE ,NEVY OR ARMY through NDA or other technical and non technical exams….that doesnt require knowledge of iit level …. just figure out what you really want in life and work smart in that direction .. take care .
